TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Tuapuu, title = Tuapuu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tuapuu} }

S.FORM: alang Tuapuu ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Umitan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 60 buwan, 232 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 223 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 9 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 88%, Amis 2%, binah lihuyan s'uli 6%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Tuapuu hya' ga Likau-uan. tay 'zil na Tuapuu hya' ga Takimi. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Tuapuu ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Tuapuu ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Toapoo ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Umitan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 60 bowan, 232 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 223 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 9 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 88%, Amis 2%, binah lihoyan s'oli 6%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Toapoo hya' ga Likao-oan. tay 'zil na Toapoo hya' ga Takimi. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Toapoo ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Toapoo ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
